solution: Streamlit st.tabs() switching is purely client-side CSS visibility toggle — no server rerun occurs. When a @st.fragment updates data in one tab, sibling tabs keep their previously-rendered HTML. Fix: call st.rerun(scope='app') after mutations that need to be reflected in other tabs. This forces a full-app rerun so all tabs re-render with fresh data.
summary: Fix for: Streamlit cross-tab state sync — tabs are CSS-only, need st.rerun(scope='app') after mutations
